description.value: You Stride and then make a tusk Strike at the end of your movement. If you move farther than 15 feet from your chained allies, you pull them along to the nearest open space 15 feet behind you. The creature you hit must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:35] save or fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].
